In a future where the world is flooded, a boy with the ability to breathe underwater becomes the unlikely hero when he discovers a way to drain the ocean and save humanity.
A boy with the ability to breathe underwater becomes the protector of a group of sea creatures who are being threatened by human activities.
A boy who can breathe underwater is recruited by a secret government agency to explore the depths of the ocean and uncover ancient treasures.
A boy who can breathe underwater discovers a lost city under the ocean and must navigate its dangers to find a cure for a deadly disease that is affecting his village.
A boy who can breathe underwater discovers a new form of life in the ocean and must convince the world to protect it before it's too late.
